data.value: A centrosymmetric matrix is a matrix that is symmetric about the center. See  for more information.
matrix must be centrosymmetric to ensure two-way connections. For instance, if the
matrix is not centrosymmetric and is defined as:
then the structure matrix would indicate the entry 2 in the input is connected to 1, but 1 is not connected to 2.
